Run this code on your local machine to pull data from the API (hosted on your remote server)

### Load Libraries

```{r}

library("httr2")

# Read IP address from file for privacy
ipv4 <- scan("../ipv4.txt", what="character")

```

### Access the hello world API

```{r}

# Initialize the API request
link <- paste0("http://",ipv4,":8080/echo?msg=howdy!")

req <- request(link)

# Get result from API
resp <- req_perform(req)

# Check status of HTTP Call
resp |> resp_status()

# Pull the body in list format
msg_list <- resp |> resp_body_json()
msg_list

# Extract the value
msg_list$msg[[1]]


```
